Sentencas: LaGaO3 perovskites doped with Sr or Ba at the La site and Mg at the Ga site were prepared by solid-state reaction or sol-gel method and characterized.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: Enthalpies of formation from constituent oxides at 298 K were determined by high-temperature oxide melt solution calorimetry.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: Energetic trends are discussed in terms of defect chemistry.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: As oxygen deficiency increases, formation enthalpies define three trends, LaGa1-yMgyO3-delta (LGM), La1-xSrxGa1-yMgyO3-delta (LSGM), and La1-xBaxGa1-yMgyO3-delta (LBGM).
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: They become less exothermic with increasing doping, suggesting a dominant destabilization effect from oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: The endothermic enthalpy of vacancy formation is 275 +/- 37, 166 +

Sentencas: and 138 +/- 12 U/mol of V-O for LGM, LBGM and LSGM, respectively.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: Tolerance factor and ion size mismatch also affect enthalpies.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites

Sentencas: In terms of energetics, Sr is the best dopant for the La site and Mg for the Ga site, supporting earlier studies, including oxygen ion conductivity and computer modeling.
Titulo: Energetics of magnesium, strontium, and barium doped lanthanum gallate perovskites
